titles.title: Expressing the profound sorrow of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Sheila Jackson Lee.
Expressing the profound sorrow of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Sheila Jackson Lee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sorrow of the House of Representatives upon the announcement of the death of Sheila Jackson Lee, a Representative from the state of Texas.
